div.p: Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiij die maij

The saide day the aldirman assignit this day aucht dais' to Androw
litstar to cheis his craft of litstarie to vys' or merchandice
vndir the pane of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiij die
mensis maij anno quo Supra

Eodem die boudane maluyn gallicus conuictus fuit per assisam istorum
subsequencium videlicet domini Johannis ruthirfurd militis Alexandri Red Johannis Colisone thome
Prat Johannis Wormet Dauid matheson' Andree branche Willelmi blinsel Willelmi
Kintor Jacobj colisone patricij leslie Donaldj strachin Alexandri nachtj et Dauid
Spens Jurati pro crudeli lesione et molestacione et tribulacione Karoli
Elleot gallici Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt Ex ore dicti Johannis Ruthirfurd'
militis prelocutoris dicte assise Et dictus Karolus quitus fuit de perturbio
ipsius boudane teste Curia

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvjo die
maij quo Supra

the saide day Alexander Watsone grantit to releiwe and freathe
Robert evinsone of Samekile of his maile as he has
tane fra him quhilkis extendis to xxxvij s' and vij d'

The saide day William Kintor lauchfullie callit nocht comperit to ansuer'
to the borghe Strekit one him be James Kintor for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of ane almarie or xviij s' tharfor the balyeis chargit
Androw nachtj sergeand' to tak ane streis and lat it agan to the borghe
and It be askit and warne him to this day xv dais to ansuer'
to the said' borghe as Secunde day of process'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxo
die maij quo Supra

Eodem die Willelmus chamer fecit constituit et creauit Willelmum blinsell
patricium leslie et dominum Johannem Stirueling coniunctim et diuisim suos
legittimos procuratores cum potestate substituend' vnum et plures sub aliquo ipsorum
ad prosequendum Relictam Alexandri Stokar' pro dampnis super quandam terram
in vico superiore ecclesie Sustentis et factis ad respondendum eidem super clameis suis
penes eandem promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiorea forma procuratorij
cum omnibus terminis necessariis et oportunis

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvijo die
maij

Eodem die Johannes Red pardonar conuictus fuit pro perturbio fratris Johannis arnot
ministrj domus Sancte trinitatis per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis ruthirfurd'
prelocutoris assise Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt pro qua emenda soluet
vnam li' cere in luminarj facto in dominica proximo sequente et aliam li' cere lumini
Sancti Sanguinis

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem penultimo
die maij

Eodem die Johannes lammyngtone conuictus fuit pro perturbio thome
glenmaluyn per assisam Juratam ex ore Andree branche prelocutoris
assise Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt et Idem thomas quitus
de perturbio prefati Johannis

The saide day Cornelius boll grantit vp that he had gert tak
vp ane pok of Skinnis of Jonhne Waus apone the ourloft
and the pok was haill and the Skinnis was spilt and he gert
haue out the Skinnis of the Schip to dry thame and gert
lay in agan als' mony as gott' agan

The said day frer' Jonhne arnot minister of the hous' of the trinite
of Abirdene lamentabile complenyeit and menyt to the balyeis apon
thomas Jonhnsone pardoner' that he wranguislie and agannis the law
hed strubulit Jonhne gordone pardonar his seruand asking remed of law
apone the quhilkis the balyeis accusit the said JonhneThomas and Eby his wyff
for the wranguis' stubulance strubulance of the said Jonhne quhilkis thai denyit and
in continent with consent of batht the said partiis the saide actione was
put to the decisione of ane Suorne assis' of thir personis that Is
to say Androu branche Dauid mar' William Kintor Alexander nachtj
cristj prat Symon' gardin Williame murray Jonhne thomsone
Androu louson Alexander gray and thomas narne quhilkis riplie avisit
the Richtis and preuis of batht the said partiis herd and vndirstandin deliuerit
and furtht giff that thai coud acquyt the saidez thomas Jonhnesone and
Eby his Spous' of Strubulance of the said Jonhne gordone neuirtheles
thai fand It in the saidez Jonhnis defalt and the prouocacion in him for he
Come apone the said thomas and Eby in thar' avne hous' be the moutht
of the saide Androu branche forspekar of the saide assis'

The saide day Agnes leis was conuikit be the saide assis' for the wranguis'
strubulance of Jonhne chamer and Androu chamer be the moutht of Androw
branche forspekar for the quhilkis scho was in ane Amerciament of the Court
and to amend' as law will and forber' in tyme to Cum et cetera

The saide day Jonhne Wischeart grantit him feit with Jonhne barbour'
for half ane yer for the quhilkis he fande Androu chamer souerte
to the saide Jonhne for tene Schillingis becaus' he was maid
feit seruand' obefor to Jonhne of chamer and the said Johne Wischeart
oblist him to releiwe the saide Androw tharanent

the saide day thomas lammyntone was in Ane amerciament of the court be
the ane Suorne assis' Androw branche forspekar for the wranguis'
strubulance of Agnes stracht Ande the saide Agnes in Ane amerciament
of the Court for the wranguis' Strubulance of the saide thomas and
Ilkane to amend as law and to forbeir' in tyme to Cum

Eodem die thomas prat deuenit plegius legalis quod Johannes lammyntone thomas
lammyntone filius suus et vxor ipsius Johannis erunt Indempnes pro thoma
glenmaluyn et Agnete stracht sponsa sua aliter quam per viam Juris

Et Willelmus Kintor deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus thomas glen
maluyn et Agnes Sponsa sua erunt Indempnes pro dictis Johanne thoma
filio suo et vxore sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et quelibet dictarum parcium
obligatur ad conseruandum suos l plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione
per manus et bona et cetera

Curia balliuorum dicti burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio quinto Sexto die
mensis Junij anno quo supra

Eodem die Johannes Wischeart conuictus per assisam Juratam ex ore
Johannis ruthirfurd militis prelocutoris assise pro perturbio Jacobj craik
Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt Instrumentum Inuentum fuit per dictam
assisam quo dictus Johannes vsque est accipere equos et alias bestias
a graminibus suis vbi ligantur et eas in granis Inponere

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' sere
Jonhne Ruthirfurd forspekar that Cornelis boll skippar of
the keruell and his barnis of his Schip sall mak gude fatht
the gret bodelie aithe that thai skathit nocht the said skinnis
nor wist nocht quhay skathit thame and assignit friday that next
cumis to thame nocht present to cum and dispone thar' aithez

Eodem die Dauid galichtlie legittime vocatus responsurus plegio alias
super ipsum per Andream lammyntone porrecto pro iniusta detencione
ab eodem duorum le guthtlingis pro vno vnicorne non comparuit
Igitur precipitur henrico orvm seriando ad capiendum dictrictum ab eo et
eundem ad plegium dimittj si petatur Et eundem Andream premunire
hodie ad quindenam tanquam 3o die huius processus

Eodem die Johannes Nicholsone conuictus per assisam Juratam
ex ore Andree branche prelocutoris assise pro perturbio Johannis mathe
sone et Jonete famule sue quibus emendabit ut Jura volunt
Insuper Soluet vnam libram cere ad lumen Sancti Sanguinis
Et si perturbium alicuj In postrum commiserit et Inde conuictus
fuerit Soluet vnam marcam ad fabricam ecclesie beati Nicholaj

the saide day William Kintor grantit he hed' ane ald' almary
of James Kintorris quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to deliuer
to him within terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Decimo quarto
die mensis Junij Anno quo supra

The said day the borgh strekit be thomas mar one Alexander prat
that he wrangvislie withheld fra him certane frauche fra him was fundin of nayne
awaile be an suorne assis' patrik leslie forspekar for the quhilkis the
saide thomas was in amerciament of the court' And the saide Alexander quyt of his
chalange of the saide frauche

The saide thomas mar was in amerciament of the Court' for the
vrangvis' strublance of Alexander prat' within the crya of our Souerane
lordis ayr and tile amend as law will and to forber in tyme to cum

The said day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane suorne assis'
patrik leslie forspekar that Jonhne grige sale haue and resaue the fyv
barellis of floure tane be thomas mar and michellet ghenes fra patrik
gilyeame Induellar of the tovne of Deip Ande quhat that the saide
thomas and michellet had to s's' overwrites 'y'.ay to patrik gilyeame the saide
Jhonne sale mak ansuer' to thame in his behalf
Curia tenta in pretorio quinto die Julij anno quo supra

add.foreign: taxtores pro Sustentacione octo anglicorum familiarium ducis de York

div.p:
The first day of July the yer' forsaide thir personis vndirwritin that is
to Say Williame gareauche eldar Williame blinsel Dauid spens
Jonhne thomsone thomas meldrum Alane litstar and Alexander prat was
chosin and Suorne the gret aithez till taxt and extent be thar' conscience
and athis throw the haill tone fywe Schillingis and iiij d' Ilkan day for
the Space of ane monetht to the Sustentacion of aucht Inglismen
of the duk of Yorkis direkit to the tone be our Souerane lordis
hienes and his lettres tharapone And als' to extent fiwe merkis to Alexander menyeis
for to pas' to our Souerane lord to Recouer' licence to the tone to reman
at hame fra the weir' to defend' the tone fra our ald' inemyis of
Ingland' et cetera and for the reconpensing of the labouris done be him at
the last parliament in the presenting of the commissone' et cetera

The said day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Robert
blinsell forspekar that patrik clerk sal Joys' in tak the demi of the vidmyll
and Richard Redheid' ane quartar for samony termes as ples' thame
and the aldirman sal lay Rachteris and gret tymmir' to mak the trocht
for the quhilkis thai sal pay as for the haill myll xviij merkis to
Robert huchosone and the said Robert has defalkit xiij s' et iiij d' yerlie
to the said patrik

the saide day It was ordanit be ane assis' Robert blinsel forspekar
that Androw lammyntone sal preiwe Sufficientlie befor the balyes one friday
that next cumis that he bocht yone gudis befor pasche that he tuk out of
Rubislaw and gif he previs it he is quyt of the arrest brekin and gif
he falyeis is in his preiwe he is in ane Amerciament of the courtis

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem octauo die
mensis Julij quo Supra

the saide day the court wardit schew for law and it was gevin
for dome be the moutht of Jonhne Williamsone dempstar of this court
that Androw lammyntone hes falyeit in his preiwe as day assignit
to him to preiwe he had bocht the gudis takin be him out
of Rubislaw befor pasche

The said day the aldirman and balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis
to patrik leslie to ansuer' to Williame gareauche for the fraucht
of xxj barrelis of as' as law will

Eodem die Johannes malisone in amerciamento Curie per assisam Juratam ex
ore Willelmi blinsel prelocutoris assise pro perturbio Dauid mathesone
Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt Insuper dictus Johannes amerciatur pro iniusto
Impedimento dicti Dauid ad occupandum solium suum dummodo plegium
per ipsum desuper porrectum determinatum fuerit

The saide day Willekin lichthernes Skippar' of the veiris followit
Jonhne Wormet Walter gareauche Walter philp Thome Watsone
Williame portar thomas philp Symond' Smolt and Robert
moir' for ladyne aucht to him and his schip ourvart to the partis of
Zeland quhilkis personis denyit And in continent the said action'
was put to the decisione and declaracion of y ane Suorne assis'
quhilkis riplie auisit the richtis allegacionis ande resonnis of batht
the saide partiis herd seyne and vndirstandin deliuerit and furthtgaff be
the moutht of Williame blinsele forspekar of the said assis' that
the saide personis awe to gif to the said Williame Skippar'
frauc ladyne to his Schip eftir the tenor' of the chartir party
maid' betuix him and the gudmen of the toune tharapone

the saide day Jonhne of beruy was conuikit be ane Suorne assis' William
blinsell forspekar' for the wranguis' strubulance of Duncan Soutar and to
Amend' as law will and forber' in tyme to Cum for the quhilkis Amendis
he sal pay xvj d' to the said Duncan Ande gif euir he offend to the said
Duncan in tyme to Cum and beis conuikit tharfor he sal pay xl s'
vnforgevin to sanct nicholis werk for the quhilkis Jonhne nicholsone come
Souerte be his hande lande and gudis

Eodem die Johannes nicholson in futy deuenit plegius legalis quod Duncanus soutar
erit Indempnis pro Johanne beruy et aliter quam per viam regis Et Dauid mar'
deuenit plegius legalis quod Johannes beruy erit Indempnis pro dicto Duncano aliter quam per
viam Juris Et quelibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad releuandum fideiussores
suos de huiusmodi fideiussione

The saide day Jonhne Duncansone In banff Solemptlie protestit that gif
his Skinnis being in the handis of Dauid mar' yongar happinis be haldin
fra him eftir the Schippis in the havin of Abirdene happinnis to saile for
his costis Skathis dampnis and expens'

The saide day Jonhne Duncansone In banf grantit to pay Dauid mar'
yongar xxviij s' In penny worthtis at his cumin to banff he being
warnit of his cumin be Suorne prisaris Ande gif he fraudfullie
falyeis he grantit him to pay doubill the saide Some

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene xj die Julij tenta In pretorio eiusdem
anno quo Supra

Eodem die Johannes meldrum amerciatur per assisam Juratam ex ore Willelmi
blinsel prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Ricardi Redehed' Et dictus Ricardus quitus
de perturbio ipsius Johannis

Eodem die plegium porrectum per Johannem arthour super Johannem annand' pro iniusta
p eiectione decim pellium wlpium extra nauim Et dictus Johannes annand'
quitus de calumpnia ipsius Johannis Arthouris

The saide day It was Statut and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis and consal for the
commone profit and Sayffty of the tone' that al fremen burges of this
burghe comper personalie one monunday the xviij day of July Instant
at the cunneger' hill' Welbodin and abilyeit for wair' in thar personis
Ilkane eftir thar' faculte and degre as efferis Ilkane havand ane sper'
or j bow and ane targe with vthir defensabile wapins the sper' of v
elne and demi eftir the tenor of the kingis proclamacion And to Remane
within this burghe for the defens' of the Samyn fra our ald' Inemyis
of Ingland And euere fremen' that falyeis and Remanys nocht personalie
within this burghe sal pay viij s' Ilkan day for his forfat to furnist
vthir personis to the defens' of the tone vnforgevin

The saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' patrik
Alexander Rede forspekar that the borghe' strekat be William gareauche
eldar one patrik leslie for the wranguis' haldin fra him of the
fraucht of xxj barrelis of as' was of waill Ande the said patrik
In ane Amerciament of the court And to pay the fraucht of the saide xxj barrelis
of as' to the saide Williame safar' as the as' is of vaile and gif
the ais' extendis to mair' thane the frachtis to deliuer it to Jonhne blabir'

The saide day It was Statut ordanit and deliuerit be the aldirman and
Consal for the weill of merchandice that al personis havand gudis
in the Schippis of the veris pertening to Cornelis boll and Willekin
hamuart in this last rais' sal lay ladin in thame agane eftir the
quantite of thar gudis betuix this and thurisday that next cumis and
al personis that falyeis sal pay wast fraucht

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiij die Julij
quo supra

Eodem die Robenot gallicus et alij suj complices conuicti per assisam Juratam
ex ore Alexander Rede prelocutoris assise pro perturbio bertannat le freis' Cuj
emendabunt ut Jura volunt Et emenda eiusdem refertur ad prepositum et
consilium

Eodem die Willelmus Kintor fide media se obligauit Alexandro Rede in quadraginta s'
vsualis monete scocie pro firma piscatorie Dauid Kintor fabrice ecclesie debita infra quindecim
dies soluend' Et si deficerit huiusmodi summam duplicare in solucione promisit testibus patricio Rede
Willelmo colp et thoma Symsone
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die mensis Julij

the saide day Johne Kintor Sett and taxt Ilkane day iij s' et j d' of male
for ane Sellar' that Robert Culannis happinnis to occupey it without tak
or richt of him
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die Julij

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday the xxij day of August
next to cum to William gareache to preiwe qu befor tham in this tolbutht
quhat the xxj barrelis of as' was of waill the tym that patrik leslie Intromettit
with thame pertening to John blabir' And warnit the said patrik to be thar the said day
